cons: Eating too much of walnuts can cause diarrhea in course of pregnancy.
description: Walnuts can form a part of weight management diet.consumption of walnuts is unlikely to cause weight gain or obesity.
Walnuts contain a compound called melatonin, responsible for conveying messages regarding the cycle of light and dark to the body.
Walnuts contain biotin (vitamin B7) that helps strengthen hair, reduce hair fall and improve hair growth to certain extent.

Walnuts contain the highest amount of antioxidants. Around 100 g of walnuts will give more than 20 mmol antioxidants, which makes them extremely effective in combating heart disease by their ability to destroy free radicals.
Walnuts are rich in B-vitamins and antioxidants that prevents your skin from free radical damage and prevents wrinkles and signs of ageing.
name: Walnut
pros: Walnuts can form a part of weight management diet.consumption of walnuts is unlikely to cause weight gain or obesity.
Walnuts contain a compound called melatonin, responsible for conveying messages regarding the cycle of light and dark to the body.
Walnuts contain biotin (vitamin B7) that helps strengthen hair, reduce hair fall and improve hair growth to certain extent.

Walnuts contain the highest amount of antioxidants. Around 100 g of walnuts will give more than 20 mmol antioxidants, which makes them extremely effective in combating heart disease by their ability to destroy free radicals.
Walnuts are rich in B-vitamins and antioxidants that prevents your skin from free radical damage and prevents wrinkles and signs of ageing.
walnuts are effective in preventing gallstones.
Omega-3 also helps to reduce depression and ADHD. Also, the omega-3 with manganese help to maintain bones in a good condition.
Most nuts are good for skin. Benefits of walnuts for skin are due to the antioxidants they contain.
Nuts contain vitamins A and E, they protect the skin against free radical damage, thus preventing the signs of aging.
